channel.title: The Order of Týr Radio Show
channel.description: Take an auditory journey into the musical minds of Order of Týr and catch up with what we've been listening to!

item.title: Podcast #043 – The OoTPC is B-A-C-K
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: We talk about things that happened…because, you know…things happened…and my mic craps out when I get excited, but the OoT Podcast is back!!!! Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima
item.content:encoded:
We talk about things that happened…because, you know…things happened…and my mic craps out when I get excited, but the OoT Podcast is back!!!!



Music: Machinae Supremacy - Sidology 3 – Apex Ultima

item.title: Radio Show #005
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: The Radio Show is back for the first episode of 2012!! Songs in this Episode In Tenebris & Knightrider of Doom – Rhapsody The Touch – Stan Bush O Death – Jen Titus Downfall – Children of Bodom Knight of the Wind – Crush 40 Gunning Down Romance – Savage Garden Intro/Outro – The Bran [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Radio Show is back for the first episode of 2012!!

Songs in this Episode

  • In Tenebris & Knightrider of Doom – Rhapsody
  • The Touch – Stan Bush
  • O Death – Jen Titus
  • Downfall – Children of Bodom
  • Knight of the Wind – Crush 40
  • Gunning Down Romance – Savage Garden

Intro/Outro – The Bran Flakes – Betcha Don’t Know Where My Mommy Shops
item.itunes:subtitle: The Radio Show is back for the first episode of 2012!! - Songs in this Episode In Tenebris & Knightrider of Doom – Rhapsody The Touch – Stan Bush O Death – Jen Titus Downfall – Children of Bodom Knight of the Wind – Crush 40

item.title: Radio Show #004
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: We’re a bit late on releasing this one as you can tell by the MCFC reference. =) We also had a bit of technical difficulties, but it’s not that Just Donna can’t handle! Here’s the Dubsteb Guns video we reference Songs in this Episode Blind Guardian – Precious Jerusalem Nocturnal Rites – Me Hopesfall – [...]
item.content:encoded:
We’re a bit late on releasing this one as you can tell by the MCFC reference. =) We also had a bit of technical difficulties, but it’s not that Just Donna can’t handle!

Here’s the Dubsteb Guns video we reference

Songs in this Episode

  • Blind Guardian – Precious Jerusalem
  • Nocturnal Rites – Me
  • Hopesfall – The End of an Era
  • Darren Hayes – A Conversation with God
  • Klaypex – Lights
  • Killswitch Engage – My Last Serenade

Intro/Outro – The Bran Flakes – Betcha Don’t Know Where My Mommy Shops

item.title: The Order of Týr Radio Show, Episode #001
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: With great pleasure may we introduce our new forum for sharing music, The Order of Týr Radio Show! Here we will share with you the music we’re into and why! Enjoy! Songs in this Episode Take That – Rule the World Living Sacrifice – Reject Symphony X – When All is Lost Kamelot – Rule [...]
item.content:encoded:
With great pleasure may we introduce our new forum for sharing music, The Order of Týr Radio Show!

Here we will share with you the music we’re into and why! Enjoy!

Songs in this Episode

  • Take That – Rule the World
  • Living Sacrifice – Reject
  • Symphony X – When All is Lost
  • Kamelot – Rule the World
  • Coronatus – Scream of the Butterfly
  • Van Canto – Lost Forever

Intro/Outro – The Bran Flakes – Betcha Don’t Know Where My Mommy Shops
item.itunes:subtitle: With great pleasure may we introduce our new forum for sharing music, The Order of Týr Radio Show! - Here we will share with you the music we're into and why! Enjoy! - Songs in this Episode Take That - Rule the World
